attributes.action: Bring back national lockdown like we had in march, everyone stay at home
attributes.additional_details: To save lives peoples health matters and help nhs and stop people having to chose work or life. Make it clear for everyone.
attributes.background: Bring back national lockdown like in march where guidance everyone must stay at home save lifes and help nhs cope. Save lives. At least until cases drop again and we get more people vaccinated. If you cant work from home you should still stay at home unless u work for nhs or supermarkets
